alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 8:24PM MDT until July 07 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Judith Basin County in central Montana... Western Fergus County in central Montana... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 823 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles southeast of Belt to 8 miles south of Geyser to near Stanford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Stanford, Denton, Geyser and Coffee Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
